posts.post_text: January 24, 2019 at 10:44 PM#2unfortunately applying AddUservar converts the variable to a floatingpoint (with 6 digits).--if you use IntelliVars you could replace line 8 withCode$FORMULA "$cue=$cue + 0.001" ; $CALCULATE(+ change the wait-time of line 8 from 'Follow' to 0.05s)learn more about IntelliVars here:[url=http://www.ma-share.net/forum/read.php…61174#msg-61174]Glad's IntelliVars[/url]

posts.post_text: January 25, 2019 at 3:14 PM#5Of course !after running your macro "create GLADs Intellivars Vol.2"I have running my macro "BO"01 Blind On02 Setuservar $cue = (BO after which cue ?)03 Block Cue $cue Presettype "dimmer"04 Search Attribute "dim" At 0.1 Thru 100 if Cue $cue /nc05 SelFix SearchResult06 Unblock Cue $cue Presettype "dimmer"07 At 008 $FORMULA "$cue=$cue + 0.001" ; $CALCULATE09 Store Cue $cue /cueonly /nc10 Label Cue $cue "B.O."11 ClearSelection12 Blind OffYou can see the before and after the result on the attached photos...Thanks for your help !ImagesIMG_20190125_154414_HHT.jpg3.77 MB4,000 × 3,000IMG_20190125_154707_HHT.jpg4.31 MB4,000 × 3,000IMG_20190125_154707_HHT.jpg4.31 MB4,000 × 3,000

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: January 25, 2019 at 4:40 PM#6Check the timestamp of your executed Macrolines.line 9 executes at the same time as the IntelliVars of line 8, way too fast, giving no time for the Intellivars to do their job.Seems like you didn't enter the required timing in the Wait columnPlease make sure that this column reads "0.05" instead of "Follow"
